alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:04PM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches. accumulations expected Thursday and Thursday Night. * WHERE...Niagara, Erie, Chautauqua, and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will transition to wet snow between 8 pm and 11 pm this evening with accumulation of 1 to 3 inches by the Thursday morning commute. Snow will continue Thursday with 2 to 5 inches of accumulation by sunset. Snow continues Thursday night with additional 3 to 5 inches. Additional minor accumulations are possible Friday.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
